root: ^!It’s been a long day. My daughter, Amelia, and I just moved to a new neighborhood. I’ve been unpacking, chugging coffee down, and unpacking some more.
^!It hasn’t helped that Amelia has been non-stop begging to go to the mall.
^?Mom, can we please go to Gothic Glam! I can’t find my favorite record in all these boxes…
^!Maybe it’s in one of these boxes. Just let me finish unpacking.
^?But mom… We could even get a pretzel as a reward for unpacking!
^!Amelia knows my weak points… I love those damn mall pretzels.
^!Fine! But don’t even think about trying to buy anything else. One record and pretzels only.
